answers.answer: Hi!Blood in urine can be due to UTI, stones, bladder polyps, infections or cysts, vaginal and cervical infections, affection of kidney as in diabetes and hypertension.You need to consult your doctor and find the cause. If there is no burning in  urine, then probably you have a small stone or a bladder polyp causing some bleed. Take care!
